title: Does Unity Ads support third party networks?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am a publisher using Unity Ads in my apps to generate revenue
  • I wish to integrate SDKs into Unity Ads

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity supports MoPub as a third party network. An adapter for Unity Ads is provided to be included with the MoPub SDK.
Please see this Google Doc for more information on how to integrate SDKs into Unity Ads.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please see the Unity Ads FAQ pages for more information.
